channel.title: Oscar Domingo - Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content on Oscar Domingo - Portfolio

item.title: Hello World
item.description:
First blog post of the many to come on a irregular basis, and from dispar topics, read below for more info.

What


A blog, that will support my personal portoflio. Which is built with a Static Webpage Generator called Hugo, with a custom template created by me specificly for this site, using paper and pencil, html, sass and javascript. I consider this website a ongoing project, and I am launching it being aware thats it’s not complete.

I intend to write irregulary in topics that span from web development to cgi, including Linux and updates of my current projects.

Why


I always wanted to have a blog, never knew what to talk about, cause sometimes it’s hard to focus on a topic.
Why Hugo? I had to help a friend with a Jekyll website, and start diggin in the Static Content Generators, and Hugo peaked my curiosity, and I though it would be cool to learn something new.

When


Irregular. I don’t want to set a minimum post cause writing is not what I pursue.

item.title: Content Hub at oki-ni
item.description:
Commisioned Work


Since we migrated from another platform (at oki-ni), we had to rethink how to keep the blog section we had in the old website, and that Demandware doesn't support by default.

Skills used


  • Wordpress (PHP) and Plugins
  • Wordpress Theme (HTML/CSS/JS)

So we concluded that a blog built with Wordpress would fit our needs, and so, I developed a bespoke template for what we today know as Editorial at editorial.oki-ni.com

The main page is a Masonry (Desandro’s) grid, with a infinite scroll and lazy loading plugin.

The site makes use of custom post types for each section of the blog, allowing more freedom on the look of each of them.

The site is constantly going under changes to try improve the speed loads and the usability of it.

item.title: Katana - CGI
item.description:
Personal Work


Integration of a CG object (a pair of katanas) in a real photograph.
Made on February of 2014.

Skills used


  • Modeling (Autodesk Maya)
  • Texturing (Adobe Photoshop)
  • Lightning and Rendering (mentalRay)
  • Coloring, correction and compositing (The Foundry Nuke)

Check it out at Artstation

item.title: About
item.description:
Oscar Domingo Ramos


I was born and raised in Barcelona, studied Uni (Multimedia Degree) in Barcelona, and after a while working as full stack developer in a small company, I decided to take the leap to London, where I decide to increase my skillset by studying a course of 3D for visual effects. I don't like to label myself in one field (web dev) or the other (cgi), since I enjoy both a lot.

Contact

If you would like to reach me you can do so by:
Writing me an email at hello@oscardomingo.eu
Saying hi @minkiu on Twitter.
Connecting with my LinkedIn profile Oscar Domingo.
Also you can check my Github (minkiu) profile.
